name: The Slime Potion
description:
Controls are up, left and right arrows, down opens a pause menu.
The goal is to find all ingredients needed to brew your potions.
But dont let them be stolen by the gnomes, or you have to steal them back!

To brew the potion, visit the kettle with enough ingredients.
The first number in the hud (left upper corner) is how many you have,
the second is how many are still left in the world.
